metadata.title: Cyqle | The Collaborative Cloud Environment for Teams & AI Agents
metadata.description: Unify your workflow in a collaborative cloud environment powered by intelligent AI automation.

hero.title: The Collaborative Cloud Desktop
hero.description: Put your workflow on autopilot. Bring your agents, or use ours.

aiAutomation.title: AI That Works For You
aiAutomation.description: Record any action and turn it into a reusable, shareable automation. Let AI handle the grunt work for you.

cloudNative.title: Access From Anywhere
cloudNative.description: Your cloud desktop environment. Pick up where you left off, on any device, at any time.

collaboration.title: True Multiplayer Desktop
collaboration.description: Invite your team to a shared session. See cursors, type together, and solve problems in real-time.

instantEnvironments.title: On-Demand Workspaces
instantEnvironments.description: Instantly launch tailored environments for sales demos, new hire onboarding, or secure testing.

development.title: Development
development.description: Share local development environments, debug collaboratively, and ensure everyone is on the same page.

qa.title: QA & Testing
qa.description: Reduce testing cycles by 70%. Automate desktop tests, reproduce bugs instantly, and collaborate on fixes.

customerSupport.title: Customer Support
customerSupport.description: Cut resolution times in half. Instantly launch a shared session to see, guide, and solve customer issues.

operations.title: Operations
operations.description: Automate routine checks, data entry, and system monitoring without writing a single line of code.

aiSection.title: Put Your Workflow on Autopilot
aiSection.description: Our AI watches how you work, identifies repetitive patterns, and suggests automations you can build in seconds. No code required.
items: Automate any task with one-click recording
Schedule jobs to run anytime, on any site
Build a shared library of automations
Connect your stack with powerful integrations

items.quote: Cyqle has cut our customer resolution time by 40%. A game-changer for our support operations!
items.author: Sarah Johnson

items.quote: Our QA productivity has soared. Cyqle's automation has saved us hundreds of hours.
items.author: Michael Chen

items.quote: Cyqle has bridged the gap between our development and operations. Collaboration has never been better!
items.author: Alex Rodriguez

cta.title: Stop Switching. Start Shipping.
cta.description: Unify how you develop, test, and do work. Start your free trial today.

footer.description: The collaborative cloud environment for teams & AI agents.
